Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.15 Niyyānikaduka » 13.15.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.15.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.15.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Piṭṭhiduka
Niyyānikaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
313.
4742Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ.) Niyyānikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ.) Niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
4743Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  aniyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
